website_summaries.verdict: Detail cutting is no problem for the securely seated blade in this knife.
pros: Blade stays steady for precise cutting along marked lines
Snap-away design keeps sharp blade available throughout a task
Feels good in the hand for its size, and allows for a secure grip
cons: Locking wheel can be stiff to turn, and location is inconvenient to reach during cutting jobs

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and handy and adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: The Olfa knife has super sharp blades and I can adjust as much blade out as any task requires. Sometimes I actually want the blade out a couple of inches, like when I'm cutting foam rubber. Then, the Olfa excels. Other times, a quarter of an inch of blade will cut the tape on a box with less danger of cutting fingers. This knife is great.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: An architecture student's best friend
customer_reviews.text: As an architecture student making models from bass wood and chip board this was honestly the best school supply I bought. The blade stays steady and lets me cut precise straight lines. and it's strong enough to cut through any material I've made models out of so far. I've even used it to cut different plastics. The only thing I can possibly suggest having room for improvement is adding some padding to the handle, or having another model with more padding, but it only became uncomfortable after cutting through 4 ply museum board for 12 hours straight. So with normal use the handle is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best Box Cutter--Easy to Use--Light Weight--Comfortable to Hold.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for about 20 years but left it with a friend and was looking to replace it. I had been using a big pair of scissors to break down boxes but since I was receiving so many deliveries, I really needed a box cutter. I was searching and recognized the OLFA tool on Amazon. It was like meeting up with an old friend. The design had not changed. It is very easy to use, you simply turn the knob that allows the blade to be moved to the cutting position or retracted. It is comfortable to hold and relatively light and easy to use. I highly recommend the product and the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My husband had one and lost it. We searched high and low and could not find it. Couldn't find a store that had it, either. Then I looked online here and found a replacement. It was exactly the same. What a relief! Happy to have it! My husband uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Eisenstein

customer_reviews.title: nice utility knife
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it except the locking mechanism for the blade position. My old one had a mechanism that locked the blade automatically in place when the correct blade extension was selected. One this one you have to loosen a locking wheel to move the blade than re tighten the wheel to lock the blade in the new position. Just takes more time to adjust the blade length. Still a very very sturdy and use full knife
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Made in Japan
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these at work in the early 2000's. I had forgotten about it when I left the job and got into another line of work. I really like the fact that you can adjust the blade precisiely where you want it and tighten it down. It won't open in your pocket if you bump it like the slide lock ones can. This is, suprisingly... made in Japan. Awesome snap-tip utility knife. I just ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Duty Cutting Knife
customer_reviews.text: We all used these cutting knives when working at J. Walter Thompson Ad Agency Studio (over 20 years ago). I have been using this knife ever since. They are very strong, durable, extremely sharp and can always remain sharp by clipping the dull part of blade off. The tightener is always secure. I will keep buying these for friends and family until they stop making them. A valuable tool!
customer_reviews.author: Zenzi Zang

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different utility knives in the past, but this is one of the better ones. The blade slides in and out with ease, but locks into place very well. I've never had it slip on me. I've tried others in the past with auto-loading blades, but they slip or come off the back piece too easily. If this thing breaks down the road, I'll happily buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than box store throwaway kind
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice knife. It is a little light weight but feels good in your hand. I would not say it is heavy duty so take that into account. The adjustment knob is very smooth and allows you to slide the blade out in small increments to get the exact depth that you want. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I bought two now so I don't have to share
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I was very wrong comparing it to my dollar store ones. It's sturdier, it can be sharpened, it's easy to lock in case the child gets hold of it, the lock actually works unlike the dollar store ones. I bought a second one so I don't have to share with my crafting boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Burrz

customer_reviews.title: It's Worth A Few Extra Dollars For The Comfort And Control
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Box cutters have come a long way since I used them on my first job in a grocery store. The blade on this tool adjusts simply for every task. The locking mechanism is easy to use and locks the blade into postion securely. The grip is contoured with finger grooves and fits my hand perfectly, giving me great control and eliminating any tendency to slip. This is a small but versatile tool and will prove useful in enough situations to earn a place in my bug out bag. In fact, many workers will find it convenient to carry it in their pocket as an EDC during the day. There aren't many foreseeable tasks that it won't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. High

customer_reviews.title: DONT LET YOUR FRIENDS SEE THESE, they WILL steal them :)
customer_reviews.text: Im on my 10th one already. Seriously, this is best knife on the planet, I would buy a box of these just to ensure that I have them for the rest of my life. There is no other better utility knife. End of story.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nalli

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent utility knife - Holds the blade firmly!
customer_reviews.text: Most utility blades do not hold the blade firmly, or do not allow precise adjustment of how much blade is sticking out. This one does both, is sharp, precise and rugged. I buy them 3 at a time and put them in my tool boxes, work aprons and workbenches. This is the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ski boat driver

customer_reviews.title: Never jams like my Stanley
customer_reviews.text: Using one hand, it's easy to turn the knob, releasing tension so you can slide the blade out. My Stanley would always jam when extending the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Burns

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Knife I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 of these, around the house. I love the wheel design, operable with one hand while multi-tasking. My wife uses one for her hobby/craft projects and she loves it, too. Wheel design may not be for everyone, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Great sharp knife. I love the segmented razors so you can snap off the full section and start fresh with a sharp section again. Keeps the knife in service longer and conveniently not having to take it apart to replace blades.
customer_reviews.author: SWFL

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: There are many utility knives/box cutters on the market. This is one of the best I have used. It is easy to adjust blade length and install a new strip of blades. The locking knob is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: Safe and useful cutter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product more than a year ago and have used it on various craft project with my son and I am pretty pleased. It serves the purpose of cutting and it's safely retractable. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Obaida

customer_reviews.title: spend the extra cash for a quality built tool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I didn't but only of those 10 packs of cheaply made Chinese razor knives. This is a high quality tool and is holding up nicely to my abusive workshop. The locking wheel is a must have. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: DIY User

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to be strong to use this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife solely to cut up Amazon and other boxes for the recycling bin 😊 So far, so good. It's probably pretty cool-looking to a kid, so I would keep it away from children and pets, and use with caution! (Not worth a trip to the ER...)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 - one for work, one for home. The work one is used for cutting wire and cable insulation. This will eat up wimpier knives. So far, this knife is doing well.
customer_reviews.author: TheDellroy

customer_reviews.title: Great Blade for Slicing The Tops of Bread Loaves
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ratcheting blade, and I like it much more than the other, cheaper one that I had. I use these blades for baking -- slicing the tops of loaves before they go in the oven, specifically -- and this knife works like a charm. The screw-tightener is very nice and easy to operate, and the blades are always sharp. I bought an affordable box of back-up blades, which are easy to size at 18mm. A great tool in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: easy to change the blades
customer_reviews.text: This is the authentic OLFA and it lives up to its reputation for sturdiness and ease of use. I've bought countless dollar store and generic versions and they only last a couple of weeks. Take the plunge - spend the extra $3 or $4 and it will be the only utility knife you will need for months to come.
customer_reviews.author: H. Grublak

customer_reviews.title: Love this blade*****
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! Would recommend to anyone who needs a locking blade of determining size. Sharp, sturdy, and feels good in the hand. Blade holds tight and little to no visible wobble as you draw the blade down/across your surface. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  knob tighten blade make it much easier to op[en package.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this model has a knob to tighten blade so you don't have to hold it when you are opening a package.
customer_reviews.author: Creative & Organized

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting Foamboars
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for cutting out foamboard for a hobby. I’ve used this knife before and know that it is very sharp and easy to break off pieces to create a new sharp edge. Also this knife is great for cutting corners as you can extend the blade quite far to let it flex.
customer_reviews.author: Jbdb04

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Fits your hand nicely and it meets all of your performance needs (and many newly discovered applications).
customer_reviews.author: Gerrall White

customer_reviews.title: A purchase you won't regret.
customer_reviews.text: I have been carrying one of these for about six years now, and just picked up a second for keeping in my shop. The knife is a solid build and the lock wheel allows for infinite adjustability, with a very satisfying clicking action. From opening boxes by cutting only through the later of tape, to cutting two inch foam, this knife has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great box cutter
customer_reviews.text: This box cutter is so awesome and quick when I want to do my work with wood, paper and foam. It is so good that I only had it for around two weeks and someone just steal it from my studio table... I guess I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jiang Xingyi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product today right after it was delivered. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: J. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Love These Cutters!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best box cutters that money can buy. I've had several of these for many many years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good for me. I like that it feels quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: another good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my old one. I have tried to purchase other box cutters and the blade keeps sliding back into the handle, this one remains in one place when I am tearing down boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida Haibi

customer_reviews.title: Solid and works well
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, ratchet mechanism works smoothly and locks easily. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: ProgrammerByDay

customer_reviews.title: Good Cutter
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cutter for foam core mold making for silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, ergonomic and perfectly sized. You cannot go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: buyer0815

customer_reviews.title: Good Knife
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for 20 years. Great knife and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Strictly Ceilings

customer_reviews.title: All around great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to cut XPS insulation foam for crafting, it cuts through it like butter! Well constructed, sturdy, sharp, and I love the ratcheting design. Will definitely be purchasing more in the future, and recommending them to anyone who needs one!
customer_reviews.author: Nunyo Business

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a little difficult to use for a lefthanded person but I will adapt
customer_reviews.author: Debralee A.

customer_reviews.title: refillable when time comes
customer_reviews.text: I own already, and am picking up extras, so good.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This utility knife is very good quality. I love how sturdy and sharp it is. However, I wish it was easier to open and close. The dial must be turned to push the blade up and down. I would still recommend this utility knife.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Don't care at all for the locking mechanism. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Fisher

customer_reviews.title: If I had only found this 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: This is the best razor knife I have owned. The ratchet wheel is great and easy to operate with the thumb of your holding hand. Fit and finish is nice. Will be purchasing more blades and the larger 25mm size next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home Project
customer_reviews.text: Its working really it make it money already. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Staple of my life
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife. My only concern is that people keep stealing it because it's that awesome. This is a great investment. I used to buy those lame exacto-knives that were frankly disposable until I met this little buddy. Now I buy it new blades and I buy new ones when the knife itself gets stolen or lost somehow. It is a seriously worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: ahmedsammad

customer_reviews.title: solid hefty knife
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap knife - it is thick and solid and nicely weighted. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The thing feels solid in the hand, actions work great, relatively inexpensive price point. Would 100% purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: pooryoricksalmanac

customer_reviews.title: The Only Utility Knife You Will Ever Need!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool. I've used it many times and it still has not gotten dull. It can be used at different lengths and it has a locking mechanism that is very strong. If you tighten it very well, there is no way that knife will move. I use this knife for crafting and I will definitely repurchase if I ever lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Lola D

customer_reviews.title: There is a good reason why all the reviews are 5-stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best utility knife you can buy. Period. end of story. It feels good in your hand, functions properly, and is really well made. Like other reviewers have pointed out, the blade can be adjusted for any depth cut, so scoring is easy with just a small amount of the blade exposed. This is a great brand to, OLFA has been around for a while and makes quality stuff. The blades are also extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Howland

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Quality Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: A very good utility knife. The snap-off blades are a real convenience without having to change blades common with other utility knives. However, the turn knob must be used to advance/retract and lock the blade. Not quite as convenient as the slide and click device on my other Olfa knife. Overall, Olfa makes a fine quality product.
customer_reviews.author: R. CHAN

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp, more safe than a typical box cutter. Potentially many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome box cutter. Superduper sharp. I wish it were easier to see whether the blade is out or in, however; my husband has bifocals and finds it hard to see. It would be great if they had a red "marker" on it to indicate "blade is out." Otherwise, love it.
customer_reviews.author: mistyake

customer_reviews.title: Keep your fingers safe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I kept buying a cheaper product, about the only manufacturer available in stores, and got tired of blades that wouldn't lock in position. This knife securely locks the blades with a screw mechanism, and uses the same replacement blades as the cheaper product.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: The best product of its type
customer_reviews.text: The best product of its type, and probably the cheapest tool you can buy with such a high level of top-quality Japanese engineering and production.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Spier

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. In the past I've used traditional utility knives with a single razor in them that can be flipped around once and then have to be replaced. They're always loose, they have a button on the top to slide the blade in and out (which is *completely* in the way) and generally they just don't feel safe. This OLFA knife has none of those problems. It locks down tight in any position, allowing much more control over depth of cut, and I'm much more comfortable working with it than with any other utility knife I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett L Darnell

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is worth its money this is my second one and I love it!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martin F. Mierz

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice quality, great product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product, blades doesn't lose once you tight it, looks well made, does the work very well
customer_reviews.author: Angel arturo

customer_reviews.title: Good blade and lock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and sturdy, locks in tight. Haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More expensive, but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I bought a couple of these utility knives. I go thru them like crazy. I'm sick of the cheap ones that you can buy at the big box stores. I've had these for a couple years and they stand up to hard work. I would have thrown away several cheaper knives by this point, so while pricy, this model is better over time.
customer_reviews.author: Healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutter, wish it had the slider/auto-lock slider
customer_reviews.text: Very good cutter. But the dial I need to turn each time to slide the blade out and lock down is clumsy when I need to use it for quick box cutting. There is minimal play on the blade which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased so many utility knives before finally purchasing this one and this thing is AWESOME. Sturdy build meant to last a long time under serious use. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great utility knife. My first one broke after 28 years of use. I was delighted to see that I could buy a direct replacement because I still had extra blades. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: DTSully

customer_reviews.title: the best of the rest.....
customer_reviews.text: look no further and by one,two,three.or a dozen. there is simply not a better designed utility knife out there. it does everything extremely well. lightweight, perfect balance and the snap and go blades are genius. it really doesn't get any better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: airgas1998

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, sturdy, heavy duty - exactly what I was looking for. Has a nice lock to keep the blade from sliding or to keep it closed. I use this constantly and love it so much I'll probably get a couple more to keep around. ☺
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal blade
customer_reviews.text: This is just an amazing utility knife. Great locking ratchet mechanism, sturdy blade and good comfortable handle. Can't ask for more and at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: aem

customer_reviews.title: It's housing is made from plastic, but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's housing is made from plastic, but it is still more solid than others I have seen and has stood up to heavy cutting.
customer_reviews.author: azezal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of my favorite hand tools
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of my favorite hand tools. I have several, worn, beaten, epoxied together, paint splattered- they still handle hardcore production environments despite being plastic (the knob was prone to breaking, but the newer design hasn't failed me)
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Feels great to hold
customer_reviews.text: Feels great to hold, and the blade that comes with it is super sharp, much sharper than the Stanley replacement blades I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty snap blade knife. Ratchet lock on it. I use this in my RC airplane hobby. They have some interesting options on blades. I will try more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Waynemia

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed knife ... order one and you will see ... the pictures don't do it justice ... someone "fixed" many of the design issues with other utility knifes when designing this ... I have ordered extra to replace my other crappy ones ...
customer_reviews.author: Just to help

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Black Magic Crafts @ youtube
customer_reviews.text: The host of BlackMagicCrafts told me about this product,and this tool has been a godsent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cutting Xps foam and it performs even better than expected. Very sharp and high quality feel to it compared to others I've used. Just buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was a quick shipment and I love that I can snap off the blade and have a new one. I got to test it out with the packaging that it came in I always break down my boxes for recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Premium Nippon Steal
customer_reviews.text: Best box cutter this side of the South China Sea. Great quality and blades are premium Nippon steal that cuts like the finest crafted Japanese blades.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Trump

customer_reviews.title: Locks in place tight.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Good construction and quality. I love that I can adjust the blade exactly how I need to and it locks in place tight. No slippage. It's also easy to change the blade. No other tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Magpookie

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: These are made in Japan. Where else are you going to find a box cutter still made in Japan? This company is serious about producing a well made cutter. The plastic used is the heaviest, hardest plastic Imhave held in a long time. Very good blade.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: superior to the cheap disposable blades
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to the cheap disposable blades I'm used to using. Love being able to set an exact depth for the cuts.
customer_reviews.author: JPK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all around utility knife.
customer_reviews.text: Never going back to the smaller size. Use for architecture models and now as a shop knife as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dekker

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far the best utility knife I have owned. Already owned the 9mm one and loved it also. Had to get used to the twist lock for the blade but it does what it says and locks the blade in place securely. Feels good in hand. This will be the only brand I purchase from now own.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Drechsel-Turner

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to have in the kitchen and one for ...
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to have in the kitchen and one for the garage tool box. Idea for cutting and opening all sorts of things and a great safety profile if you need to keep the kids form accidentally touching
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor knife I've used
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand. The blades are thicker and stronger than average razor knife blades, and keep an edge longer. Thank you Black Magic Craft!
customer_reviews.author: T. Pangle

customer_reviews.title: Best knife out there
customer_reviews.text: Best knife out there! Make sure you buy Olga blade for it. The cheaper blades just don’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiluv

customer_reviews.title: Foam beware
customer_reviews.text: Best knife I have ever used for building some foamy airplanes. Stays sharp longer.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN KEPHART

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use the utility knife daily for opening everything. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Paushter

customer_reviews.title: Good knives
customer_reviews.text: This is my favotite kind of knife for doing some crafts works. But not easy to find in the stores. So glad found it in Amazon. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: L. W

customer_reviews.title: Great blade, great handle
customer_reviews.text: The original OLFA blade. Every self-respecting DIY-loving household needs one of these. The construction of the blade holder is quite hefty to the hold, and is perfectly balanced. OLFA were the first to make these cuter knifes in the 50's, and they are still the best.
customer_reviews.author: baejoseph

customer_reviews.title: High cutting quality
customer_reviews.text: OLFA is my go-to brand when it comes to cutters. Their products had never disappointed me over the years in terms of its high cutting quality and durability, and this cutter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marty M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cut foam core and it works well for that.
customer_reviews.author: JeanTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best little gadget I've purchased in a long time. So easy to use. Blades are super-sharp. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M Schlesiona

customer_reviews.title: Olfa 5003 L-1 Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: My husband had specifically asked me to order this knife for him. He had used them in his business for years and loved them. The only problem is that his employees did too and so they would disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schindler

customer_reviews.title: I like how it comes with a bunch of extra blades ...
customer_reviews.text: The twisty knob thing is actually a pain. Get one without it. I like how it comes with a bunch of extra blades though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P. Church

customer_reviews.title: LIke it
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Secure in hand. Blades are sharp and easy to replace
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had one for 20 years. Threw it around from job sites to my home. Finally the ratchet wheel broke, I've got this one to replace the broken one. I am ready for another 20 years. Thanks OLFA. :)
customer_reviews.author: Splus

customer_reviews.title: convenient, useful
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, handy little mat knife. Had to get one for my husband and will probably put it in some Christmas stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wylder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like the locking wheel. Feels sturdy and high quality thing (at this price range).
customer_reviews.author: Alvy

customer_reviews.title: fabulous little utility knife - sharper than the others
customer_reviews.text: I read about this knife on a wallpaper forum. It is the only utility knife I have found that lets you trim wallpaper while it is damp without tearing the fibers. It make a nice clean cut and stays sharp. Its a marriage saver for wallpapering.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for art projects
customer_reviews.text: This is far better quality than the plastic versions you get at the local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Pittle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knives
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product great for crafting i use it daily.its one of the best knives I have

customer_reviews.title: classic tool with scandinavian quality design, .... and very versatile. I use it for cutting picture mats to styrofoam insulatio

customer_reviews.title: my favorite general duty knife
customer_reviews.text: my favorite blade, snap off keeps the blade fresh and turn knob ratchet lock is secure. the only thing to be careful of is when youre replace the blade, it can slip out too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sujan

customer_reviews.title: Great for packages and boxes
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Locks in place great. I use it all the time to open packages and boxes. Great quality

product_meta.title: OLFA 5003 L-1 18mm Ratchet-Lock Heavy-Duty Utility Knife
product_meta.description:
Number of Items:1OLFA 5003 L-1 18mm Ratchet-Lock Heavy-Duty Utility Knife

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Original OLFA Snap-Off Heavy Duty Cutter Features A Contour Durable Handle With A Ratchet-Wheel Blade Locking Mechanism And Unlimited Blade Adjustment. Includes LB Blade.
feature_bullets: Professional strength stainless steel blade channel secures blade for the toughest of cutting jobs
Blade is made of high-quality Japanese grade carbon steel and designed for unparalleled sharpness and superior edge retention
Long lasting and durable - a new sharp edge with just a snap
Great for cutting paper, cardboard, roofing, drywall, vinyl, acetates
